20101231070605.000|20101231070606.000|CC1|CLOSURE OF A MAJOR ROAD IN      
20101231070606.000|20101231070607.000|CC1|THE LOCAL MOUNTAINS CREATED

20101231070608.000|20101231070611.000|CC1|RESIDENCES AND TRAVELERS.       
20101231070611.000|20101231070613.000|CC1|330 MAIN ROUTE TO BIG BEAR      
20101231070613.000|20101231070614.000|CC1|IS CLOSED AND A LOOK AT THE     
20101231070614.000|20101231070616.000|CC1|DAMAGE FROM LAST WEEK'S         
20101231070616.000|20101231070617.000|CC1|RECORD STORM SHOWS WHY.         
20101231070617.000|20101231070619.000|CC1|CALTRANS SAYS THAT 330 WILL     
20101231070619.000|20101231070621.000|CC1|BE CLOSED THROUGH THE END OF    
20101231070621.000|20101231070622.000|CC1|WINTER AND SOME SAY THAT IT     
20101231070622.000|20101231070625.000|CC1|MAY BE EVEN LONGER.
